twoSetSkill.name: Aspect of Creation 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Units summoned by the host gain 60% Total DMG Multiplier.

threeSetSkill.name: Circle of Life 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: For every summoned unit (including supporting friends), gain 20% Total DMG Multiplier. Stacks up to 5 times.
